mapper.insert: insert into tb_festival (fes_name, fes_start, fes_end, admin_id) values (#{fes_name}, #{fes_start, jdbcType=DATE}, #{fes_end, jdbcType=DATE},#{admin_id});
mapper.select: SELECT fes_idx from tb_festival where fes_name = #{fes_name}
select * from tb_festival where admin_id = #{admin_id} order by fes_start asc;
select fes_idx, fes_name from tb_festival where fes_idx=#{fes_idx}

select a.fes_idx, fes_name, b.ft_name, a.fes_loc_name, fes_loc_lat, fes_loc_lng from (select b.fes_idx, a.fes_name, a.fes_loc_name, b.fes_loc_lat, fes_loc_lng, a.ft_bno from tb_join_list as a left join tb_fes_loc as b on a.fes_loc_name = b.fes_loc_name where fes_idx = #{fes_idx})as a left join tb_foodtruck as b on a.ft_bno = b.ft_bno
